mapper.sql: d.DetailCourse_Id, d.Course_Id, d.DetailCourse_Name, d.Serial, d.AddName, d.AddTime, d.UpdateName, d.UpdateTime, d.DeleteName, d.DeleteTime, d.TimeLiness

mapper.select:
select ,
from detailcourse d inner join course c on c.Course_Id=d.Course_Id where d.TimeLiness = 0 and c.Course_Id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update detailcourse
Course_Id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
